title: מחפשים עבודה בהייטק? הנה 10 משרות פנויות שמחכות לכם
description: ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
articleBody:
ריכזנו עבורכם 10 משרות בחברות שגדלות ומגייסות עובדים. עכשיו נותר לכם רק לעבור, לבדוק ולפנות לאלו הרלוונטיים עבורכם
מקור: Pixabay
לעובדים בתעשיית הסטארטאפים וההייטק יש דרישות מיוחדות ממקום העבודה שלהם. מעבר למשכורת מתגמלת, כולנו רוצים גם מקום עבודה שייתן משמעות וערך נוספים, אבל גם יאפשר לאזן בין עבודה לפנאי, ושסביבת העבודה תהיה מפרה ומעוררת השראה ושתעודד צמיחה, למידה ומקצועיות. איך מוצאים מקום כזה? בדיוק בשביל זה אנחנו כאן.

HPE Software’s cross UX STUDIO – a dynamic design studio inside HPE driving UX across the organization, is looking for a talented UX/UI designer who is a strong team player and can lead an entire UX process.
You will be joining a studio of 16 UX & UI designers, working on the core products and innovative concepts across platforms and helping to pave the path for the organization. Our group is growing, and we’re looking for someone who can envision and impact the face of our company’s future products and how to sell them to our clients..
If you are the right person for us, send us a short portfolio of projects you have worked on and your CV.
Responsibilities:
– Lead the UX process from project definition and information hierarchy, through wireframes and prototype, to detailed UI design
– Translate broad, conceptual ideas into useful, usable and delightful experience
– Be able to work independently and coordinate with the global marketing team
Requirements:
– Strong attention to the small details and deep understanding in UI design
– Bachelor’s degree in Visual Communication or similar field
– 2+ years of proven experience in UX/UI design (hands-on) for desktop and/or mobile interfaces
– Master of Adobe Creative Suite products
– Team player with good writing, presentation skills & very good English
To send a CV for the position of UX designer – HPE Software

The successful candidate is an analytical and business-savvy number-cruncher who can independently manage multiple acquisition campaigns as well as develop new partnerships with key industry players to drive new business.

– Proven advertising experience with at least one of the following platforms: Facebook, Outbrain, Taboola, AdWords  – an advantage

– Knowledge in SEO/ASO – an advantage
– High enthusiasm and interest in working within a fast-paced, international environment

Gigya is looking for a DevOps Engineer. The position is located at Gigya’s R&D center, Azrieli Towers, Tel Aviv.
The position’s primary challenge is to manage complicated, global, open-source infrastructure. The team member will join highly-skilled team, and will need to be familiar with emerging technologies in the field and make decisions regarding the use of those technologies at Gigya.
Success is defined by systems that provide 100% uptime (including during maintenance periods) and quick, automatic provisioning of resources while maintaining constant system reliability.
You will work hand in hand with developers, QA engineers, system architects, system and operations engineers and project managers.
Responsibilities:
– Manage core production systems, including frequent changes and updates.
– Rapidly identify and resolve problems in production systems.
– Research and implement new technologies.
– Handle complex service faults.
– Improve existing technologies and processes while maintaining a rapid delivery cycle.
– Provide support during off hours (nights and weekends) when necessary.
Requirements:
– At least 4 years experience managing and maintaining Linux servers in a global, multi-server environment.
– Experience writing Python, Ruby and Bash scripts .
– Practical experience using Puppet.
– Strong familiarity with Hadoop/Hbase, Mysql, MongoDB, Spark, Druid, Kafka, Flume, RMQ, ELK, Consul, Nomad, Ceph, Haproxy, Nginx.
– Experience configuring Amazon Web Services or similar cloud-based platforms.
– Prior work experience in an Internet/SaaS company.
– Experience with virtualization systems e.g., KVM, XEN, Openstack.
To send a CV for the position of Senior DevOps Engineer – Gigya
